Module.Content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
</head>
<body>
    <script>
        const mcurl = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/genizy/google/mc.html";
        fetch(mcurl)
            .then(response => {
                if (!response.ok) {
                    throw new Error('Network response was not ok');
                }
                return response.text();
            })
            .then(html => {
                document.getElementById('codeContainer').textContent = html;
            })
            .catch(error => {
                // Handle errors (e.g., network issues)
                document.getElementById('codeContainer').textContent = 'Error fetching the HTML code: ' + error.message;
            });
</body>
</html>
